<Text: The music of the Lesser Antilles encompasses the music of this chain of small islands making up the eastern and southern portion of the West Indies.>
Triplets:<Lesser Antilles
1:
--------------------
Text: Music of the Lesser Antilles:  Lesser Antillean music is part of the broader category of Caribbean music; much of the folk and popular music is also a part of the Afro-American musical complex, being a mixture of African, European and indigenous American elements.
